hotspots.label: Patella
hotspots.info: The kneecap bone that protects the front of the joint.

hotspots.label: Synovial Membrane
hotspots.info: The lining that produces synovial fluid to keep the joint oiled.

hotspots.label: Synovial Fluid
hotspots.info: The slippery liquid that reduces friction between bones.
